title: Coastal Cool Newport Beach Escape with Three Restaurants & Daily US$50 Dining Credit
description:
Experience SoCal paradise at this coastal retreat, where sun-drenched luxury and endless adventure come together. Plunge into a trio of sparkling pools hidden among lush gardens or sip craft cocktails from the stylish Oasis Pool Bar. From cabana lounging to seaside adventures, the Hyatt Regency Newport Beach invites you to create memories drenched in coastal charm.

Hit up iconic Newport Beach just steps away, or cruise over to the buzzing Balboa Peninsula for a taste of local fish tacos or clam chowder. Shopaholics can rejoice with Fashion Island's retail haven a quick hop away. Whether you're catching gnarly waves, chowing down on mouthwatering seafood or cruising along the coastline on roller skates, Newport Beach has all the ingredients for a memorable getaway.
offer_address: 1107 Jamboree Road, Newport Beach, California 92660, United States
